intro: Change visualizations of your data on the map
You can input any keyword to filter your data

1. More/Less Table:
Show more or less data.

2. GeoMask:
Mask customers' locations. MapTime provides intelligent way to mask customers' locations without loosing any precision.

3. Show/Hide Columns:
Choose essential columns to show.

4. Download:
Download your data with latitude and longitude
You can come back to the tutorial at any time.
